com.ibm.async_util.locks.AsyncReadWriteLock.ReadLockToken

  • Packages that use AsyncReadWriteLock.ReadLockToken 
    Package Description
    com.ibm.async_util.locks
    Provides asynchronous analogues of synchronization primitives.

    • Uses of AsyncReadWriteLock.ReadLockToken in com.ibm.async_util.locks

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AsyncReadWriteLock.ReadLockToken AsyncReadWriteLock.WriteLockToken.downgradeLock()
      Downgrade this write lock acquisition to a read lock acquisition without any intermediate release.
